message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $8500 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8700. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.
